author: Deleted User
content: What is the rationale for using the Validator Key to issue the Voluntary Exit?

author: Deleted User
content: As opposed to the withdrawal key. In the case of the latter, a staking service could generate, keep safe and propose/attestate blocks with its VK on behalf of a customer, while the customer generates  and keeps the WK in a very safe place, until they decide to perform such voluntary exit.
